structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Examination Of Sureties; Approval Of Bonds
law.text: The fees of magistrates for the examination of sureties and approval of bonds or for the taking of recognizances shall be in each case five dollars for the citation, if any, and the first dayâ€™s hearing, and two dollars in addition for each adjournment thereof. These fees shall be paid in advance.
